text: John Philip Chisnall (27 October 1942 â€“ 4 March 2021) was an English footballer. He played as an inside forward in the 1960s and 1970s. Chisnall was born in Manchester. In 1964, he signed for Liverpool from Manchester United. As of 2023, he is the last player to have been sold between the two rivals. He also played for Southend United and Stockport County. Chisnall died on 4 March 2021, at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== *Phil Chisnall at LFChistory.net Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Manchester Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players
title: Phil Chisnall
